    No. 96-2667.
    United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit.
    Submitted Dec. 26, 1996.Decided Jan. 2, 1997.
    
      Before FAGG, WOLLMAN, and MURPHY, Circuit Judges.
      PER CURIAM.
    
    
      1
      Calvin J. Weber, a former civilian Army engineer, appeals from the magistrate judge's1 order dismissing his Federal Tort Claims Act (FTCA) action for failure to state a claim.  Weber, pro se, filed this FTCA complaint on behalf of himself and his four minor children against the United States.
